1017490.name: Mortadelo y Filemón: La banda de Corvino
1017490.description:
Mort & Phil must protect the planet from Vito Corvino, an Italian mobster, internationally sought by blackmailer, terrorist, saboteur and for making pirate cards of Canal Plus TV channel. This time, the mobster tries to finish football (soccer) around the world.

The game, a point & click adventure, includes:

- Includes the titles "Balones y patadones" and Mamelucos a la romana", as well as a third part that was unlocked by having both titles.

- Possibility of alternating between Mort & Phil.

- Local multiplayer option in which each player controls one of the two characters. Use the "Zapatófono" to communicate with your friends!
1017490.supported_languages:
西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
